verdict: EMERGENCY: $340 spent with ZERO conversions on PMax — campaign is burning money with no tracking or wrong channel

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: ZERO conversions from 125 clicks and $340 spend. Conversion tracking is likely broken or not installed

checks.name: Conversion tracking functional
checks.finding: 0 conversions strongly suggests no tracking installed. PMax requires conversions to optimize — running blind

checks.name: Tag firing verification
checks.finding: No conversions recorded — must verify tag installation immediately

checks.name: Wasted spend on irrelevant terms
checks.finding: 100% of $340 spend is waste — zero conversions. Every dollar generated nothing

checks.name: PMax search terms
checks.finding: PMax search terms not reviewed — with 0 conversions, PMax has no signal to target relevant queries

checks.name: Campaign naming convention
checks.finding: CTM prefix with location — clear naming

checks.name: Campaign count per objective
checks.finding: Single PMax campaign — but PMax is wrong choice with 0 conversion data

checks.name: Brand vs Non-Brand separation
checks.finding: No brand campaign. No search campaign. Only PMax which cannot optimize without conversions

checks.name: PMax as only campaign
checks.finding: PMax requires conversion data to optimize. With 0 conversions, it has no signal and is essentially running random ads

checks.name: Quality Score checks
checks.finding: PMax only — no keyword-level Quality Score available

checks.name: CTR vs industry benchmark
checks.finding: 2.38% CTR on PMax is below average — ad assets may not be compelling

checks.name: PMax audience signals
checks.finding: With 0 conversions, any audience signals are useless — PMax cannot learn without conversion data

checks.name: PMax Ad Strength
checks.finding: Asset quality not verified — but irrelevant until conversion tracking is fixed

checks.name: Smart bidding strategy active
checks.finding: PMax uses automated bidding but with 0 conversions it has nothing to optimize toward

checks.name: Geographic targeting accuracy
checks.finding: Austin area targeting — verify service area coverage

checks.name: Budget efficiency
checks.finding: Even at $11.33/day, this is 100% waste with no conversions

quickWins.action: PAUSE PMax IMMEDIATELY — $340 wasted with 0 conversions. PMax cannot function without conversion data
Install conversion tracking — verify tags on website for calls and form submissions
When tracking is fixed, START with Search campaign (not PMax) — Search works with low/no conversion data
Verify landing page loads correctly and has clear CTA

items: Pause PMax campaign immediately — it cannot optimize with zero conversions
Install and verify conversion tracking (phone calls + form submissions)
Test landing page: load speed, CTA visibility, contact form functionality
Determine exact service offering and target keywords
Launch a Search campaign (not PMax) with manually chosen high-intent keywords
Use Max Clicks bidding initially to gather conversion data
Set up proper geographic targeting for Austin service area
Once Search generates 15+ conversions/month, consider adding PMax
Test LSA if eligible for the service category
Only increase budget once CPA is established and acceptable
Build remarketing audiences from site visitors
